general.description: This station protects the Empire's north-western flank from incursions. It is a modern station, with a large complement of crew and ships to protect the local space. However, the occasional pirate still slips through, but not in enough numbers to be a true threat.
general.bar: The bar is clean and orderly, and there are several bartenders tending to the needs of the patrons. Several officers come and go to talk to the men in here.
